title.rendered: Tastebudz Purple Kush Strain Photoperiod Seeds

content.rendered:
🍇 Purple Kush Strain – Feminized Photoperiod Seeds by Tastebudz Syndicate

Fruity, Potent, and Perfectly Relaxing

The Purple Kush strain from Tastebudz Syndicate is a standout indica-dominant hybrid created by crossing Blackberry Kush x Grandaddy Purple. With its rich purple hues, sweet fruit-forward terpene profile, and heavy body effects, Purple Kush is a favourite among collectors who crave flavour and full-body calm.

Expect dense, resinous buds, deep relaxation, and a seed-to-harvest time of just 8–9 weeks. With 25% THC and yields up to 500g/m², Purple Kush offers both quality and efficiency in one visually stunning, flavour-packed strain.

Please Note: These feminized photoperiod seeds are sold strictly as adult souvenirs. Germination or cultivation of cannabis seeds is illegal in the UK without a government-issued license.

📊 Purple Kush Strain Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Blackberry Kush x Grandaddy Purple
Strain Type Indica-Dominant Hybrid
Flowering Time 8–9 Weeks
Indoor Yield Up to 500g/m² (info only)
Outdoor Yield Varies by climate
THC Content Up to 25%
Flavours Blackberry, purple grape, exotic fruit
Aromas Sweet berry, earthy, floral undertones
Effects Deeply relaxing, calming, stress-relieving

🌟 Why Purple Kush Strain Is a Cult Classic

  • Deliciously Fruity: A unique fusion of berry, grape, and tropical terpenes.
  • Strong but Smooth: 25% THC delivers a body-focused high without overwhelming sedation.
  • Perfect for Night-Time: Ideal for evening sessions, stress relief, or post-work wind-down.
  • Visually Stunning: Striking purple hues and dense, sticky buds.
  • Fast Finishing: Ready in just 8–9 weeks with indoor-friendly structure.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions About Purple Kush Strain

1. What is the Purple Kush strain?
Purple Kush is an indica-dominant hybrid made by crossing Blackberry Kush and Grandaddy Purple. It’s known for its fruity flavours, vibrant purple buds, and deeply calming effects.

2. What does Purple Kush taste like?
Expect sweet blackberries, purple grape, and exotic fruit notes with earthy undertones. It’s smooth, rich, and lingers on the palate.

3. Is Purple Kush good for sleep and stress?
Yes. Its calming, long-lasting body effects make it a go-to for evening relaxation, sleep support, and mental decompression.

4. How long does Purple Kush take to flower?
This feminized photoperiod strain flowers in just 8–9 weeks and produces up to 500g/m² under ideal indoor conditions.

5. Is Purple Kush good for beginner growers?
Absolutely. Its resilience, compact size, and generous yields make it a solid choice for both novice and experienced collectors.

🛒 Add Purple Kush to Your Collection Today

Visually stunning, deeply calming, and rich in flavour, the Purple Kush strain is an essential addition to any indica fan’s seed collection. Whether you’re drawn to its legendary lineage or luscious terpene profile, Purple Kush brings beauty, power, and bliss in every bud.

🍇 Why Tastebudz Fem Purple Kush Strain?

Experience deep relaxation with Tastebudz Purple Kush photoperiod seeds. A mostly Indica strain with genetics from Blackberry Kush and Grandaddy Purple, this potent flower delivers 25% THC and yields up to 500g/m² in just 8-9 weeks. Enjoy the rich flavours of blackberries, purple grape, and exotic fruits while the powerful, long-lasting effects melt away stress and tension.
